global_options.description: Salida en formato JSON (debe ir ANTES del comando)
Habilitar logging detallado (debe ir ANTES del comando)

notes: Los flags globales (--json, --verbose) van ANTES de <category>

categories.name: chrome
categories.description: Chrome profile debugging and network log analysis

commands.name: read-log
commands.description: Read and filter Chrome debug logs for a specific profile.

commands.name: read-net-log
commands.description: Analyze Chrome network logs with intelligent filtering.

options.help: Filter for AI service requests only

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate the Bloom Context for the project.

commands.name: install
commands.description: Install Chrome extension to permanent location.

options.help: Force reinstall even if same version exists

commands.name: update
commands.description: Update Chrome extension to the latest version.

commands.name: verify
commands.description: Verify that the Chrome extension is correctly installed.

commands.name: compress
commands.description: Compress files into optimized JSON format for AI consumption.

options.help: Patterns to exclude (can be used multiple times)

commands.name: extract
commands.description: Extract files from compressed JSON format.

commands.name: tree
commands.description: Generate a visual directory tree structure with intelligent exclusions.

arguments.name: <TARGETS>
arguments.help: Specific directories or files to include (supports absolute paths).

categories.name: gemini
categories.description: Gemini AI key management and operations

commands.name: keys-add
commands.description: Add new Gemini API key with profile.

commands.name: keys-delete
commands.description: Delete a Gemini API key.

commands.name: keys-list
commands.description: List all Gemini API keys with status.

commands.name: keys-stats
commands.description: Show global Gemini keys statistics.

commands.name: keys-validate
commands.description: Validate a Gemini API key by testing connection.

commands.name: auth-login
commands.description: Store GitHub authentication token.

commands.name: auth-logout
commands.description: Remove stored GitHub token.

commands.name: auth-status
commands.description: Check GitHub authentication status.

commands.name: clone
commands.description: Clone GitHub repository to local directory.

options.help: Target directory (defaults to repo name in current dir)

commands.name: orgs-list
commands.description: List GitHub organizations.

commands.name: repos-list
commands.description: List GitHub repositories.

commands.name: dev-check
commands.description: Check development environment and service status.

options.help: Connection timeout per port check in seconds
Detailed logging of each port check

commands.name: full-stack
commands.description: Verify complete stack health (host, API, extension, Brain, onboarding)

commands.name: native-ping
commands.description: Ping the native host to verify it's alive and responding.

options.help: Timeout in milliseconds for ping response
Specific TCP port to test (auto-detect if not provided)

commands.name: onboarding-status
commands.description: Check onboarding completion status (GitHub, Gemini, Nucleus, Projects)

commands.name: websocket-status
commands.description: Verify WebSocket server status on localhost:4124

categories.name: intent
categories.description: Intent execution system and context planning

commands.name: add-turn
commands.description: Add a conversation turn to an intent's chat.

commands.name: build-payload
commands.description: Build optimized AI payload from context plan.

options.help: Output path for payload (default: same dir as plan)

commands.name: create
commands.description: Create a new development or documentation intent.

options.help: Intent type: 'dev' for development or 'doc' for documentation
Human-readable name for the intent (e.g., 'Fix login authentication flow')
Initial files to include in the intent context (can be repeated or comma-separated)
Path to the Nucleus (Bloom project root). Auto-detected if not provided.

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Delete an intent and all its data.

options.help: Skip confirmation and force delete even if locked

commands.name: download
commands.description: Download AI response from Native Host or file.

options.help: Intent UUID to download response for
Listen on TCP socket for Host connection
Port to listen on (different from Host's 5678)
Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if omitted)

commands.name: finalize
commands.description: Finalize an intent, applying changes to the codebase.

commands.name: get
commands.description: Get complete details of an intent.

commands.name: hydrate
commands.description: Hydrate an intent by processing source files and briefing.

options.help: Path to text file containing briefing

commands.name: list
commands.description: List all intents in the project.

options.help: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: lock
commands.description: Lock an intent for exclusive use.

commands.name: merge
commands.description: Merge staged files from .staging/ into the real codebase.

options.help: Intent UUID to merge files for
Pipeline stage (briefing, execution, refinement_X). Auto-detect if not provided.
Skip approval check and merge anyway
Show what would be merged without applying
Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: parse
commands.description: Parse and validate .raw_output.json from an AI response.

options.help: Pipeline stage (briefing, execution, refinement_X). Auto-detect if not provided.
Fail on any protocol violation (no fallback parser)
Path to nucleus root (default: current directory)

commands.name: plan
commands.description: Generate context plan for an intent using Gemini Router.

options.help: Intent type: dev, doc, or seed

commands.name: recover
commands.description: Recover interrupted intents using lock state recovery data.

options.help: Find and recover all interrupted intents
Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: stage
commands.description: Prepare files in .staging/ directory for merge.

options.help: Intent UUID to stage files for
Pipeline stage (briefing, execution, refinement_X). Auto-detect if not provided.
Show what would be staged without writing files
Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: submit
commands.description: Submit an intent payload to an AI provider through the native host bridge.

options.help: UUID of the intent to submit
Path to the Nucleus (Bloom project root). Auto-detected if not provided.
Chrome profile path for the AI provider (optional)

commands.name: unlock
commands.description: Unlock an intent to free it for use.

options.help: Force unlock even if locked by another host

commands.name: update
commands.description: Update an existing intent's properties.

options.help: UUID of the intent to update
New name for the intent (triggers folder rename)
Replace all initial files with this new list
Add files to the existing initial_files list
Remove files from the initial_files list
Path to the Nucleus (Bloom project root). Auto-detected if not provided.

commands.name: validate
commands.description: Validate staging files using Gemini analysis.

options.help: Skip manual review and approve automatically
Gemini model to use for analysis
Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if omitted)

commands.name: create
commands.description: Initialize a new Bloom Nucleus V2.0 project structure.

options.help: Output directory name (legacy, kept for compatibility)

commands.name: delete
commands.description: Delete a complete nucleus including all its data.

options.help: Path to the Nucleus root directory to delete

commands.name: get
commands.description: Retrieve complete details of a nucleus.

options.help: Path to the Nucleus root directory

commands.name: link
commands.description: Link an existing folder as a Nucleus project.

commands.name: list
commands.description: List all Nucleus projects found in a parent directory.

options.help: Parent directory to scan for nuclei (default: current directory)

commands.name: status
commands.description: Check if a directory is a valid Nucleus project.

commands.name: sync
commands.description: Synchronize projects and rebuild nucleus cache.

commands.name: create-exp-intent
commands.description: Create a new exploration intent in the nucleus.

commands.name: exp-discovery-turn
commands.description: Add a discovery turn to an exploration intent.

commands.name: exp-export-findings
commands.description: Export findings from an exploration intent.

commands.name: list-projects
commands.description: List all projects linked to the nucleus with their details.

options.help: Filter by project strategy (python, typescript, go, etc.)

commands.name: onboarding-complete
commands.description: Mark an onboarding step or entire onboarding as completed.

options.help: Step name to mark as completed

commands.name: onboarding-status
commands.description: Get the current onboarding status from nucleus configuration.

commands.name: project-info
commands.description: Display detailed information about a specific project in the nucleus.

arguments.name: <PROJECT_NAME>
arguments.help: Name of the project to inspect

categories.name: profile
categories.description: Chrome profile and AI account management

commands.name: create
commands.description: Crea un nuevo perfil con el alias especificado.

commands.name: destroy
commands.description: Elimina un perfil y sus datos. Requiere confirmación a menos que se use --force.

commands.name: launch
commands.description: Lanza Chrome con el perfil especificado y la extensión Bloom.

commands.name: link
commands.description: Vincula una cuenta de email a un perfil (DEPRECATED - usar accounts-register).

arguments.name: <EMAIL>
arguments.help: Email de la cuenta a vincular

commands.name: list
commands.description: MOSTRAR AL USUARIO (CLI).

commands.name: unlink
commands.description: Desvincula la cuenta asociada a un perfil (DEPRECATED - usar accounts-remove).

commands.name: accounts-register
commands.description: Registra una nueva cuenta en un perfil.

arguments.name: <EMAIL>
arguments.help: Email o identificador de la cuenta

commands.name: accounts-remove
commands.description: Remueve una cuenta registrada de un perfil.

commands.name: add
commands.description: Vincula un proyecto local existente a un Nucleus.

options.help: Nombre custom del proyecto (default: nombre de carpeta)

commands.name: detect
commands.description: Scan directory and detect project types automatically.

arguments.name: <PARENT_PATH>
arguments.help: Parent directory to scan for projects

options.help: Filter by minimum confidence level (high, medium, low)

commands.name: load
commands.description: Validates and loads project information.

commands.name: clone-and-add
commands.description: Clone a Git repository and automatically link it to the current Nucleus.

options.help: Absolute path where to clone the repository. If not provided, clones to Nucleus root using repo name.
Path to the Nucleus project. Auto-detected from current directory if not provided.
Custom name for the project (default: repository name)
Force specific technology strategy (e.g., python, typescript, android)

commands.name: run
commands.description: Start Brain core runtime

categories.name: service
categories.description: Background connection multiplexer and task runner

commands.name: start
commands.description: Start the Brain TCP multiplexer service.

commands.name: status
commands.description: Check the current status of the Brain service.

commands.name: stop
commands.description: Stop the running Brain service.

categories.name: synapse
categories.description: Chrome Native Messaging Bridge and protocol management

commands.name: close
commands.description: Envía señal de terminación al navegador.

commands.name: host
commands.description: Inicia el modo Host (Listener Loop).

commands.name: info
commands.description: Display comprehensive system information.

commands.name: path
commands.description: Display the absolute path to the brain executable.

commands.name: version
commands.description: Display or increment the version number.

options.help: Feature or capability added (can be used multiple times)
Feature or behavior changed (can be used multiple times)
Implementation detail or technical note (can be used multiple times)

categories.name: twitter
categories.description: Twitter/X integration and social data analysis
